modName: Khajiit followers and one DRAGONBORN BLADE
summary: This is my first mod and I haven\'t had any problem with it so far the blade may make a funny noise but aparently thats Alduin dieing.
descriptionHtml:
Location

They are all located in riverwood\'s sleeping Giant inn.

There is a male and a female both are followers andwere dragonplate armor, the female has the Dragonborn\'s sword, it is a modifyed version of a set called Akaviri Samurai Armor by hothtrooper44
I\'d put a link up but I don\'t know how.

Bugs

none so far but message me if you find one.

Any New Ideas message me, not to complex please.
author: Joeru Kodo
